mapper.select: SELECT qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME, qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP, qrtz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP, qrtz_simple_triggers.REPEAT_INTERVAL, qrtz_simple_triggers.TIMES_TRIGGERED FROM qrtz_job_details JOIN qrtz_triggers JOIN qrtz_simple_triggers ON qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME = qrtz_triggers.JOB_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME = qrtz_simple_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME AND qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qrtz_simple_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP
